title: Release notes metadata
description: Metadata used to structure release notes for a given product (or software collection)

product.description: Full and formal name for the product

shortname.description: Short product name for the product - used in filename generation

columns.description: Details on the index pages columns, numbered 0 to at least 1.

key.description: key to use when generatings the column data

components.description: List of valid components for product

intro.description: Multi-line string that provides a brief introduction to the release notes. Supports Markdown.

precursor.description: list of preceding releases which already have release notes. Required if there are preceding releases to be included. Will be appended to the table and navigation. If meta fields are in use, they are required in the precursor list under meta, too.

version.description: version string used for this 'precursor' version.

additionalProperties.description: whatever values are needed for each of the meta columns defined above
